Topic.Title: Find the text of a Quest game?

Posts.EditableText: is there any way to find the actual text of another game? I use the game editor and while I do see the folders for the different locations and action, there isnt any text of doing the action in game
Posts.HTML: is there any way to find the actual text of another game? I use the game editor and while I do see the folders for the different locations and action, there isnt any text of doing the action in game

Posts.EditableText: Due to the way Quest publishes the script, it disables the UI, but, you can still see the code in code view, or any text reader. Sadly, you need to understand what you are looking at to make heads or tails out of it.
Posts.HTML: Due to the way Quest publishes the script, it disables the UI, but, you can still see the code in code view, or any text reader. Sadly, you need to understand what you are looking at to make heads or tails out of it.
